<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An input function to decide if the pass should run or not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// on the given MachineFunction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::function&lt;bool(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;)&gt; DoNotRunPass;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;MRI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> &#42;TLI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42;MF = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae457f1cf451ed893666c4a384e58f8e5">AliasAnalysis</a> &#42;AA = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> Builder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Initialize the field members using \\p MF.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> init(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">StoreMergeCandidate &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The base pointer used as the base for all stores in this candidate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> BasePtr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our algorithm is very simple at the moment. We assume that in instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order stores are writing to incremeneting consecutive addresses. So when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we walk the block in reverse order, the next eligible store must write to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an offset one store width lower than CurrentLowestOffset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t CurrentLowestOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;GStore &#42;&gt;</a> Stores;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A vector of MachineInstr/unsigned pairs to denote potential aliases that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to be checked before the candidate is considered safe to merge. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unsigned value is an index into the Stores vector. The indexed store is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the highest-indexed store that has already been checked to not have an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alias with the instruction. We record this so we don&#39;t have to repeat</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alias checks that have been already done, only those with stores added</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the potential alias is recorded.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a>&gt; PotentialAliases;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addPotentialAlias(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Reset this candidate back to an empty one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> reset() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">      Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      PotentialAliases.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentLowestOffset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      BasePtr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isLegalOrBeforeLegalizer(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LegalityQuery &amp;Query,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">                                MachineFunction &amp;MF) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If the given store is valid to be a member of the candidate, add it and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// return true. Otherwise, returns false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addStoreToCandidate(GStore &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, StoreMergeCandidate &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a1960c14773241d6a238d2db593abe552">C</a>);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if the instruction \\p MI would potentially alias with any</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stores in the candidate \\p C.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> operationAliasesWithCandidate(MachineInstr &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, StoreMergeCandidate &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a1960c14773241d6a238d2db593abe552">C</a>);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merges the stores in the given vector into a wide store.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p returns true if at least some of the stores were merged.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This may decide not to merge stores if heuristics predict it will not be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// worth it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeStores(SmallVectorImpl&lt;GStore &#42;&gt; &amp;StoresToMerge);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Perform a merge of all the stores in \\p Stores into a single store.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Erases the old stores from the block when finished.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns true if merging was done. It may fail to perform a merge if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// there are issues with materializing legal wide values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> doSingleStoreMerge(SmallVectorImpl&lt;GStore &#42;&gt; &amp;Stores);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> processMergeCandidate(StoreMergeCandidate &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a1960c14773241d6a238d2db593abe552">C</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Initialize some target-specific data structures for the store merging</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A map between address space numbers and a bitvector of supported stores</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// sizes. Each bit in the bitvector represents whether a store size of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that bit&#39;s value is legal. E.g. if bit 64 is set, then 64 bit scalar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stores are legal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  DenseMap&lt;unsigned, BitVector&gt; LegalStoreSizes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
